DDB.Settings.CobaltCookie.Name: D&D Beyond CobaltSession Cookie
DDB.Settings.CobaltCookie.Hint: Your D&D Beyond CobaltSession cookie value. Find this in your browser dev tools: Application > Cookies > dndbeyond.com > CobaltSession. This is used to obtain an access token for the WebSocket connection.
DDB.Settings.ProxyUrl.Name: DDB Proxy URL
DDB.Settings.ProxyUrl.Hint: Proxy server URL to bypass CORS restrictions when communicating with D&D Beyond. Default uses the DDB Importer proxy.
DDB.Settings.CharacterMapping.Name: Character Mapping
DDB.Settings.CharacterMapping.Label: Configure Mappings
DDB.Settings.CharacterMapping.Hint: Map D&D Beyond characters to Foundry actors for dice roll synchronization.
DDB.Settings.UserId.Name: D&D Beyond Cobalt User ID
DDB.Settings.UserId.Hint: The ID of your account in D&D Beyond. When on your D&D Beyond campaign, find this by running console.log(Cobalt.User.ID) from browser console.
DDB.Settings.CampaignId.Name: Campaign ID
DDB.Settings.CampaignId.Hint: The ID of your D&D Beyond campaign. You can find this in your campaign's URL.
DDB.Settings.Enabled.Name: Enable DDB Dice Sync
DDB.Settings.Enabled.Hint: Enable or disable the connection to D&D Beyond. When enabled, dice rolls from DDB will be synced to Foundry.
DDB.Settings.UpdateDamageOnly.Name: Update Character Damage From D&D Beyond
DDB.Settings.UpdateDamageOnly.Hint: When enabled, character damage from D&D Beyond will sync.
